custom_line_width=”50″][vc_custom_heading text=”Privacy Policy” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left|color:%23da251c” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

By using any information provided on this site, you agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions.

We take your privacy seriously and are committed to protecting your personal information. Your personal information will not be shared, sold, or disclosed other than in accordance with this Policy, without an individual’s permission, or in accordance with the Data Protection Law of Dubai.

Alutech Aluminium And Glass only collects, holds, uses, or discloses personal information where it is reasonably necessary to:

  • enable Alutech Aluminium And Glass to deliver services or information to individuals or to an organization.
  • maintain or establish a business relationship, including as a customer, supplier, contractor, or employee.
  • enable Alutech Aluminium And Glass to assist to provide services; or to improve, and better understand preferences in respect of Alutech Aluminium And Glass services; and
  • fulfil legal or regulatory obligations.

Use of cookies

A cookie is a small text file downloaded onto a computer or mobile device when a website is accessed, including the Alutech Aluminium And Glass website. Cookies are widely used to make websites work, or work more efficiently, as well as to provide Information to the website’s owners and third parties.

Cookies allow a website to recognize a computer or mobile device. Cookies do not identify the individual but do identify the computer or mobile device used to access the Internet and can therefore be used to collect information about the individual’s use of the Internet. Cookies do not allow access to any information stored on the individual’s computer or mobile device.

Cookies are used:

  • to determine the number and global location of visitors to Alutech Aluminium And Glass’s website and to identify how visitors move around the site and, in particular, which pages they visit. This allows Alutech Aluminium And Glass’s website and services to be improved.
  • to collect information, where available, about a computer or mobile device for system administration purposes, such as IP address, operating system, and browser type.
  • Information collected using cookies will only be used to evaluate Alutech Aluminium And Glass’s website effectiveness and to improve user experience. Cookies are not used to identify an individual or to send targeted advertising.

Links to other websites

Alutech Aluminium And Glass’s website provides hyperlinks to websites owned and controlled by others. Alutech Aluminium And Glass is not responsible for the privacy practices of these websites. By accessing or using Alutech Aluminium And Glass’s website, an individual consents to the collection, use and disclosure of personal information as described in this Policy, as amended from time to time.

 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
